Requirement: A shield in one hand with or without a weapon in your other hand.

You move your weapon to your side and push your shield out in front of you. With a bent arm and a wide stance, you brace for blows from any angle.

Pros

Shielded

  • Your AC increases by +1.
Damage Sponge
  • When you need to make a Dexterity (Save) check, you can choose to make a Constitution (Save) check instead.
Savior
  • If you use a desperate action to Save a Target, the attack redirects to you instead of automatically hitting you. So if the previous attack roll is lower than your AC, then you manage to block the attack.
Defense Over Offense
  • You can make a Lesser Off-Hand Attack with your weapon while in Self-Defense.

Cons

Limited Offense

  • All of your damage dice are decreased by one size.
Limited Defense
  • If you leave this stance, you cannot re-enter this stance this turn.
